lead_paragraph: KAUFMAN--Robert. The Board and Staff of Lincoln Center Theater are deeply saddened by the death of Robert Kaufman. He (always with his glamorous wife Florence, a longtime and devoted member of our Patron Committee) was a great champion of ours, and an ardent theater lover. The Kaufmans supported many of our finest productions, and Bob always approached each show with an open heart and an open mind. He was funny, warm, and caring, and a great favorite of the LCT staff. We extend our condolences to his -- and our -- beloved Florence and his entire family. J. Tomilson Hill, Chairman Eric M. Mindich, President Andre Bishop, Producing Artistic Director 1/3
